name: Mountain Racing
developer: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd
publisher: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd
description: Mountain Racing is adventurous infinite racing game for everyone.You Will love to play this game again and again.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later required Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB AMD or NVIDIA Graphic Card Storage: 800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 or Later Processor: Intel Core i3 515 7U Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB AMD or NVIDIA Graphic Card Storage: 1 GB available space
